name: Game of Life (itch) (carloscruz)
description:
This is a simple implementation of Conway's Game of Life. A cellular automaton devised in 1970 by British mathematician John Horton Conway.

The initial state can be modified by 'drawing' live cells.

The speed of the simulation can be modified using the up and down arrow keys.

Press enter to pause or resume the simulation and escape to reset all the cells.
